resources.string: Get a notification when you get out of a vehicle to remind you to wash your hands

This is the content for a test notification
Allow the application to collect and send anonymous data with data activity and analytics information
Allow the application to track its performance and send anonymous data for improving in-app experience

string-array.name: breakfast_comments
string-array.item: During sleep your hands get dirty, it's important to wash them before having breakfast \u1F634
Washing your hands before breakfast will ensure you a good day \u1F609
30 seconds for good health? Where do I sign! Just wash your hands \u1F609\u1F44F\u1F4A6

resources.string: Time to lunch and washing your hands!
